meanings.definition: A curl of hair made by wrapping a strand around a finger and pinning it to the scalp.
meanings.sent1: She pinned her pincurls carefully before the party.
meanings.sent2: Her grandmother showed her how to create perfect pincurls.
meanings.sent3: The pincurls in her hair bounced as she danced.
meanings.sent4: Her pincurls were like little springs of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The pincurls framed her face beautifully.

meanings.definition: To style hair by creating pincurls.
meanings.sent1: She decided to pincurl her hair for the special occasion.
meanings.sent2: Her mother pincurls her hair every Sunday evening.
meanings.sent3: He pincurls his hair to impress his crush.
meanings.sent4: Pincurling her hair transformed her look completely.
meanings.sent5: The hairstylist expertly pincurls her hair for the photoshoot.
